Text:
These aren't the best quality like my other uploads.... Its because the original Blu-Ray has some quality issues & needs to be remastered...
Still its worth watching....

Thanku...

So was forced to edit & shorten it...
i love that you have all your audio in all your rips at least 128 kbps.. thats what all rippers lack in their rips. thanks mate!
